column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Rosemary'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Subject''':  Tolkien replies to a letter of appreciation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' from Rosemary.
*'''Publication:''' Mentioned in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Chronology'' (p. 328) and a facsimile was published in [[Mallorn 36]]
